title: Translate all agix documentation guides to Chinese
description: Translate remaining English documentation guides to Chinese to provide comprehensive Chinese language support. Currently cost-tracking.md, intelligence-optimization.md, index.md have been translated, but reliability-scale.md, advanced-features.md, observability.md, safety-control.md, and troubleshooting.md remain in English.

audit_log.reason: User requested comprehensive Chinese translation of remaining English documentation guides to provide complete Chinese language support for agix users
Feature branch created, starting translation of 5 English guides

All 5 guides translated: reliability-scale.md, advanced-features.md, observability.md, safety-control.md, troubleshooting.md. All content converted from English to Chinese to provide complete Chinese documentation support
All translations verified and complete. 5 guides now fully available in Chinese. Feature branch d9e9c90 merged to main via squash
